name: remult-mono-repo
description: See projects/core for the remult core package.json. This package.json is used for remult/core development, test projects and experimental work. See

scripts.release: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm run patch-versions
scripts.build: tsc -p projects/core/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p projects/core/tsconfig.build.esm.json && tsx misc/build-packagejson-core.ts && copyfiles README.md dist/remult && copyfiles LICENSE dist/remult && tsx misc/extract-public-api.ts
scripts.all-servers: concurrently -k -n "koa,fastify,express,mw,deno-fresh,mwc,next,svelteKit,next-app" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgYellow.bold" "tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/koaServer.ts" "npm run fastify-server" "tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/expressServer.ts" "tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/middlewareServer.ts" "cd projects/test-servers/deno-fresh && deno task start" "tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/middlewareCore.ts" "cd projects/test-servers/next-server && npm run dev" "cd projects/test-servers/sveltekit-server && npm run dev" "cd projects/test-servers/next-app-server && npm run dev"
scripts.release-next: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm run patch-versions-experimental && cd dist/remult && npm publish  --access public --tag next
scripts.patch-versions-experimental: FOR /F %i in ('npm version prerelease -preid "next" -m "release %s"') DO git push origin %i && npm run update-versions
scripts.patch-versions: FOR /F %i in ('npm version patch -m "release %s"') DO git push origin %i && npm run update-versions
scripts.test-servers:nuxt:setup: cd projects/test-servers/nuxt-server && npm i --force && tsx ../../../misc/copyRemultToNodeModules.ts && npm run build
scripts.test-servers:sveltekit:setup: cd projects/test-servers/sveltekit-server && npm i --force && tsx ../../../misc/copyRemultToNodeModules.ts && npm run build
scripts.test-servers:next:setup: cd projects/test-servers/next-server && npm i --force && tsx ../../../misc/copyRemultToNodeModules.ts && npm run build
scripts.test-servers:next-app:setup: cd projects/test-servers/next-app-server && npm i --force && tsx ../../../misc/copyRemultToNodeModules.ts && npm run build
scripts.test-latest-typescript-build: cd projects/tests/test-build-with-latest-typescript && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-docs-interactive: cd docs && npm i && cd interactive && npm i && npm run build
